DOC.brief_summary: This study design make sure exercise equipment use National Heart , Lung , Blood Institute work properly . Healthy volunteer request use P-CCMB cardiopulmonary exercise equipment ( treadmill exercise bicycle ) two time month ensure machine function properly .
DOC.detailed_description: Proper function recently acquire P-CCMB cardiopulmonary exercise equipment verify test healthy volunteer . In addition , quality control verify perform monthly test healthy volunteer biologic standard .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION : Healthy research volunteer 21 65 year . EXCLUSION : Patients history ischemic valvular heart disease . Patients history chronic pulmonary disease . Pregnant woman .
